H3.text: where does houston dynamo play. Houston

A4.text: The team plays their games at SaberCats Stadium, which is part of Houston Sports Park.

A5.text: During the 2012 season, the club moved to Shell Energy Stadium, a soccer-specific stadium in East Downtown Houston.
